version_description:
Winter is coming. Are you ready?

This winter we are back with India's largest fashion sale – EORS, Jan'17 and you better be ready. We have made saving styles to your wishlist easy and made buying from your wishlist even easier. So get used to shortlisting now!

Psst…there will be more surprises revealed in next few weeks. Download the latest version and stay glued :)

Oh and we solved bugs, fixed crashes, made the app better. But that's something we do everyday. So, why bother!

Winter is coming. Are you ready?

This winter we are back with India's largest fashion sale – EORS, Jan'17 and you better be ready. We have made saving styles to your wishlist easy and made buying from your wishlist even easier. So get used to shortlisting now!

Psst…there will be more surprises revealed in next few weeks. Download the latest version and stay glued :)

Oh and we solved bugs, fixed crashes, made the app better. But that's something we do every day. So, why bother!

What looks vanilla, has hidden flavours inside,
like long press on a product brings up similar styles.
In iMessage, use your wishlist & recents to share your vogue;
you are loosing out on the coolness if you haven't turned it on.
We fixed bugs & continued on making good stuff even better;
so, get the latest version, check it out and let's talk later!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

You might not be able to see, what we've packed in this one,
We believe too many smalls, make it a tonne.
Beware of the Ides of March, they said,
But we are not afraid, as we always look ahead.
There's more coming; a long way to go,
if you want something, come'on let us know!
Bug fixes & performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Few bug fixes & Performance improvements.

This version has a surprise that will soon unfold.
It's more awesome than ever, you're being told.
I'll give you a tip, start getting your friends, new & old.
Because the big sale is coming, and you can make some gold ;-)

It's more awesome than ever, you're being told.
I'll give you a tip, start getting your friends, new & old.
Because the big sale is coming, and you can make some gold ;-)

I'll give you a tip, start getting your friends, new & old.
Because the big sale is coming, and you can make some gold ;-)

We've been busy housekeeping! We fixed a few bugs (that we hope you never noticed), made a few changes to help you discover products better, and tinkered under the hood to make the Myntra experience smoother!

We’ve made a bunch of changes to make your Myntra journey smoother. And as always, fixed a few bugs we hope you never noticed.

What’s more you ask? Flipkart’s Big Billion Days are almost here! Watch out for updates on Myntra Shopping Groups to save big. Not part of a group yet? Create one, and invite your friends and family. It’s quick, easy and rewarding for all! Happy Shopping.

Search works so much better now! If you're on iOS 11, try our AR Shoe Size Finder to learn what size of shoe will fit you best. We've also made a bunch of changes under the hood to make your browsing experience seamless and smooth.
In this release we’ve introduced new features to secure your account, and removed a bunch of bugs that we really hope you never noticed!

The End of Reason sale is almost upon us! This release has a bunch of features to bring you jaw-dropping deals. Watch our app for details!
Also, we've made it easier for you to find just the right size of clothes & shoes for you. Check out our updated size charts feature!

Download this update and get ready to shop big and save even bigger with our upcoming sale events.  We have made changes which will help you save more. We also fixed a few bugs for a better experience.

This update comes with a new look for brand pages. Find latest launches and curated style collections by your favourite brands. Everything about your favourite brand, in one place. Like we always do, we have cleaned up a few bugs to make your Myntra experience smoother, seamless and awesome! Enjoy shopping on Myntra!

Download this update and get ready to shop big and save even bigger with our upcoming sale events.  We have made changes which will help you save more. We also fixed a few bugs for a better experience.

Download this update and get ready to shop big and save even bigger with our upcoming sale events.  We have made changes which will help you save more. We also fixed a few bugs for a better experience.

We have made changes to make Myntra feel at home on the iPhoneX. You will also notice that we have added videos for products on the detail page. We hope this makes it easier for you to make your purchase decisions on Myntra. As always, we have cleaned up a few bugs for a better Myntra experience. So, tap to update for a richer and smoother Myntra shopping experience.

This release comes with a bunch of stability fixes. It’s highly recommended that you upgrade to the new version.

We have also decided to remove collections in the coming days. Hence, you may not be able to add to collections, but you can still move products from your collections to the wishlist. More updates on this version for a richer experience on iPhoneX.

We’ve moved a few things around. Notifications have moved to the top bar. “More” at the bottom bar now has the option to contact along with other useful stuff like shoe size finder and theme stores.
We’ve added a new way to virtually try on make up products. This will definitely simplify making shade choices with the lipsticks, foundations and more. We have started with a few and are continuously adding more to the catalog which supports this feature.
Finally, some smart engineering changes for fluid transitions between screen and faster screen loads. Your shopping experience just received a speed boost . Why wait?
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
We’ve fixed quite a few issues related to app crashes. It’s highly recommended that you update to the new version for a smoother Myntra shopping experience!
Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements

Getting the best offers on Myntra is now easier & more fun! Just “Hey Siri” it. You will need iOS 12 and the latest version of the Myntra app. We have also added an interesting new way to share and get feedback on your favourite styles from friends and family. Look out for the new share icon on our product page. Enjoy shopping!

Getting the best offers on Myntra is now easier & more fun! Just “Hey Siri” it. You will need iOS 12 and the latest version of the Myntra app. We have also added an interesting new way to share and get feedback on your favourite styles from friends and family. Look out for the new share icon on our product page. Enjoy shopping!
Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements.

Shopping on Myntra now becomes more convenient with voice and image search in this latest app release. In addition this version also comes with visible improvements to performance and navigation for a superior shopping experience. Update your Myntra app now!

Shopping on Myntra now becomes more convenient with voice and image search in this latest app release. In addition this version also comes with visible improvements to performance and navigation for a superior shopping experience. Update your Myntra app now!

Now, Siri help you find the best offers on Myntra with voice commands. That’s a cool way to shop, isn’t it? We’ve also added improvements for videos to play smoothly on the product details page. A lot of improvements have been made to payments for a hassle free purchase. Update your app now and stay stylish in 2019!

We have introduced a new way to share your favourite products and get feedback. Shopping with family and friends is always more fun. We have also made changes to make navigation on the app easier. Loads of fixes and performance improvements to make shopping more enjoyable on Myntra.

We have made improvements to our checkout experience and presentation of delivery, exchange and payment options for your pin code on the product page. As always, lots of minor experience improvements and bug fixes for a smoother shopping experience.

We have re-introduced Google Sign in back in iOS, We’ve also made improvements to ratings and review so that you can make more informed purchase decisions on Myntra. And a bunch of bug fixes for a great Myntra shopping experience.

Myntra launches a new way to search for products with product clusters on some categories. Hint: sweatshirts women. Getting to the right type of sweatshirt is now easier with this feature. We have upgraded the core engine of the app to make sure Myntra runs on the latest technology available. We have also made fixes to product videos and sale timers for a better shopping experience.

Myntra launches a new way to search for products with product clusters on some categories. Hint: sweatshirts women. Getting to the right type of sweatshirt is now easier with this feature. This version also contains enhancements to product videos and sale timers. We have also fixed some app crash issues for better stability.

We’ve made changes to find your recent searches easily to continue your shopping where you left off. Sale timers also get a new look. What makes this version a must have are the optimisations and fixes that will make shopping during the big sale a rewarding experience. Update now!

We’ve made changes to find your recent searches easily to continue your shopping where you left off. Sale timers also get a new look. What makes this version a must have are the optimisations and fixes that will make shopping during the big sale a rewarding experience. Update now!

We’ve made changes to find your recent searches easily to continue your shopping where you left off. Sale timers also get a new look. What makes this version a must have are the optimisations and fixes that will make shopping during the big sale a rewarding experience. Update now!
We have enhanced size charts to make an easier shopping experience for you. There are important performance improvements and bug fixes which are included with this release.

Myntra launches the iconic global brand H&M. Grab the latest H&M styles before stock runs out! This version also includes upgrades to key components of the app for improved stability and performance. We have also fixed issues with the video player on the product detail page for a hassle free video experience. These and more minor improvements for a great Myntra experience. Happy shopping!

Myntra launches the iconic global brand H&M. Grab the latest H&M styles before stock runs out! This version also includes upgrades to key components of the app for improved stability and performance. We have also fixed issues with the video player on the product detail page for a hassle free video experience. These and more minor improvements for a great Myntra experience. Happy shopping!

We've squashed a bunch of bugs and made some changes under the hood for better performance. We've also built a nifty feature to represent product details better, you'll see more of this as we roll it out over the next few weeks. Happy shopping!

This version of the Myntra app comes with many security and stability fixes for a hassle free shopping experience. Search list gets inline visual filters for convenient filtering. Wishlist are now easier to manage with the ability to delete multiple items at the same time and clearing all out of stock with a single click. Videos on product page now play automatically. Also, keep an eye out for sales and offers on Myntra this festive season. Happy shopping!

No more tax addition on the cart. You can now see all inclusive prices for your Myntra styles on your search and product details page. This version also comes with few fixes for app crashes and other performance improvements. Happy Shopping on Myntra.

No more tax addition on the cart. You can now see all inclusive prices for your Myntra styles on your search and product details page. This version also comes with few fixes for app crashes and other performance improvements. Happy Shopping on Myntra.

Get ready for India's biggest fashion sale of the year - Myntra End of Reason Sale from 22nd to 25th Dec. This version has features that will help you get additional discounts during the sale. We have introduced a new looks feature for better style recommendations. UPI transactions get a more user-friendly interface and some critical fixes to OTP logins. This and much more on this latest version of the Myntra app.

Get ready for India's biggest fashion sale of the year - Myntra End of Reason Sale from 22nd to 25th Dec. This version has features that will help you get additional discounts during the sale. We have introduced a new looks feature for better style recommendations. UPI transactions get a more user-friendly interface and some critical fixes to OTP logins. This and much more on this latest version of the Myntra app.

Myntra launches MyntraMove. Start using now to track your fitness on the Myntra platform. We have also introduced a new method to filter your products using clusters, and looks on the product page to make it easier for you to find similar matching styles. A few fixes to improve accuracy of your recently viewed items and a host of changes for better performance. Happy Shopping on Myntra!
Bug Fixes & Perfomance Improvements

Search suggestions get better on Myntra with clearer nested suggestions and “did you mean” recommendations. We have also done a few bug fixes and stability improvements on this latest version of Myntra. Update now for the best Myntra shopping experience!

Myntra Move gets a cleaner dashboard. We have also added your recently viewed list to the product page. This, along with bug fixes and performance improvements for a better shopping experience on Myntra.

Myntra Move gets a cleaner dashboard. We have also added your recently viewed list to the product page. This, along with bug fixes and performance improvements for a better shopping experience on Myntra.

Myntra Move gets a cleaner dashboard. We have also added your recently viewed list to the product page. This, along with bug fixes and performance improvements for a better shopping experience on Myntra.

Login and Signup goes mobile only on Myntra. Its now easy & convenient to login with just an OTP. Emails are no longer necessary to signup on Myntra and can also be edited on your profile. Your mobile number can however be linked to only one active account on Myntra. We have also made improvements to onboard on Myntra Move & also on Move insights. We are also delivering personal care and fashion in line with government policies. Update now & start shopping!

Myntra Points now becomes MynCash. The value of the currency remains the same and all your Myntra Points have been converted to MynCash. We have also made it easy for more sellers to sell the same product, so that you have greater choice. Download the latest update now and get shopping!

Myntra Points now becomes MynCash. The value of the currency remains the same and all your Myntra Points have been converted to MynCash. We have also made it easy for more sellers to sell the same product, so that you have greater choice. Download the latest update now and get shopping!

We are back in style and serving to most parts of the country, and we have used the time to build a better experience on Myntra. Myntra Move now gets a Friends Leaderboard for you to track and match up to your friends activity. You can now save posts on Myntra Studio to view later. Repeat searches become easier with our new recently searched widget. Many more features added for you to get a good bargain on your next puchase. Download the latest version and stay tuned for some great deals coming your way soon!

This release comes with improved size recommendations that helps you pick the right size of your favourite styles. To provide you better recommendations and a more personalised experience we have added input cards to capture your preference. Also, included is a bunch of feature improvements and bug fixes for Myntra Move and other features. Get the latest version now and stay stylish!

We have added new recommendation cards to help you find more styles. Myntra Move gets user challenges that makes staying fit a lot more fun. Your invoices are now available in order details for download. Also included are improvements to a bunch of features and bug fixes for a great shopping experience. Happy shopping on Myntra.

We have added new recommendation cards to help you find more styles. Myntra Move gets user challenges that makes staying fit a lot more fun. Your invoices are now available in order details for download. Also included are improvements to a bunch of features and bug fixes for a great shopping experience. Happy shopping on Myntra.

We have introduced tags and collections to styles to better highlight product qualities that will help with your purchase decision. The new add to bag button on similar styles introduced for faster checkouts. We have also added necessary security checks on profile updates to ensure your account and personal data is protected against any misuse. Finally, lots of fixes and improvements for a seamless shopping experience this festive season. Stay safe, shop on Myntra.

This version comes with updates that helps you score the best deals this festive season. We have also added features to help you filter products based on delivery times and other enhancements to help the first time shopper on Myntra. Also, there have been major improvements to make the app more stable and perform faster. Stay safe, keep shopping on Myntra.
This update brings to you enhancements to Product Pages, Myntra Studio, Login flows and other fixes essential to deliver a seamless experience on Myntra.
This update brings to you enhancements to Product Pages, Myntra Studio, Login flows and other fixes essential to deliver a seamless experience on Myntra.

This edition of our app enhancements bring improvements to Product Pages to help making your shopping journey a lot more joyous. We have also introduced a feature to inspire you with new looks based on styles you like - Myntra is now your personal fashion styling assistant. Our tech teams have also worked really hard to squash those annoying bugs that get between you and the joy of shopping!

The latest version of us brings enhanced filtering and wishlist experience to make your shopping journey a lot more fun and seamless. We have also improved on our Studio which brings you the latest stories to satisfy your fashion curiosity. As usual, our tech teams have been working round the clock to fix those pesky bugs to lift your mood while shopping.

We have enhanced our Wishlists, Product Lists, and Myntra Studio to enhance your shopping experience. As usual, our tech teams continued to work round the clock to fix those pesky bugs to lift your mood while shopping.

The latest version of Myntra brings enhancements on our Product Detail pages, Studio experience and our Home page. As usual, we strive to bring you the best experience with our tech teams continuing to work round the clock to fix those pesky bugs to lift your mood while shopping
